thread.title: Cloud-focused Nextbit smartphone launches on Kickstarter
thread.title_full: Cloud-focused Nextbit smartphone launches on Kickstarter - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Erica Evans
title: Cloud-focused Nextbit smartphone launches on Kickstarter
text:
8561520|article-6476670|7 8561520|article-6476670|1 email_share_embed|photo-8561520|article-6476670|1 8561520|article-6476670|2 8561520|article-6476670|3 8561520|article-6476670|4 8561520|article-6476670|5 google_share_embed|photo-8561520|article-6476670|6 Two views of Nextbit‘s Robin smartphone, which will launch through the crowdfunding site Kickstarter. The first 1,000 phones will sell for $249. Two views of Nextbit‘s Robin smartphone, which will launch...
Former Google and HTC employees are teaming up to enter the smartphone market with Robin, a cloud-focused phone from their San Francisco startup Nextbit. Two views of Nextbit‘s Robin smartphone, which will launch through the crowdfunding site Kickstarter. The first 1,000 phones will sell for $249. Two views of Nextbit‘s Robin smartphone, which will launch...
Former Google and HTC employees are teaming up to enter the smartphone market with Robin, a cloud-focused phone from their San Francisco startup Nextbit.
